FetchData.failed_read_local_retainer_list: No retainer exists. Try to sync retainer with lodestone.

LodestoneLogin.attention_modal_content1: Your Lodestone Credentials (aka. cookie) will be saved only for fetch retainer's information automatically.
LodestoneLogin.attention_modal_content2: We won't save your account, password or one-time password.
LodestoneLogin.attention_modal_content3: By continue, you agree with the usage of your Lodestone Credentials.

MyPage.already_login_content: What would you want to do?

Preference.background_fetch_alarmmanager_desc: Fetch sales record by Allagan-tech with high precision but may consume more battery.
Preference.background_fetch_jobscheduler_desc: Fetch sales record by Eorzea-tech which saves battery but intervals are not stable.
Preference.background_fetch_start_desc: Start background fetch task manually (for debug)
Preference.delete_all_record_desc: Delete all sales records at your device.
Preference.get_sales_manually_desc: Fetch sales record from all retainers manually.
Preference.logout_desc: Log out from Lodestone, and delete saved Credentials.
Preference.refetch_char_desc: Fetch character and retainer data again from Lodestone.
Preference.regenerate_gamedb_desc: Delete current item database and re-generate.
Preference.switch_char_desc: Change character has logged in currently.

PushNotification.channel_general_desc: Namazu will notify you when your retainer has sold some item.
PushNotification.soldmessage: %s item(s) you put up for sale in the markets have sold for %s gil (after fees).
PushNotification.title: Item has sold!

Detail.universalis_tap_to_get: Tap to request Universalis sales data.
Detail.universalis_no_data: Universalis has no data of this item.
